explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注于利用生物质通过碳热法合成碳纳米结构，这属于材料科学和可持续材料生产的范畴。它与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的相关性较低。
authors: Wu-Jun Liu and Han-Qing Yu
title: Carbothermally Synthesizing Carbon Nanostructures from Biomass: A New Paradigm for Sustainable Carbon Materials Production

explanation: 该研究主要探讨全球导航卫星系统无线电掩星（GNSS-RO）数据同化对欧洲中期天气预报中心次季节预报的影响。研究发现，同化GNSS-RO数据可以显著改善平流层的预报技巧，尤其是在热带地区，并增强MJO的振幅。虽然对流层的影响不明显，但研究结果表明平流层的初始化可能与MJO的预测有关。该研究主要关注天气预报和气候预测，而非直接涉及空气质量监测、大气成分分析等大气环境遥感技术。
topic_words: ['GNSS Radio Occultation', 'weather forecasting', 'stratosphere', 'Madden Julian Oscillation (MJO)', 'sub-seasonal forecasts']
authors: K. Lonitz;F. Vitart;S. B. Healy;Qiang Fu
title: Sub‐Seasonal Impact of GNSS Radio Occultation Data
abstract: This study investigates for the first time whether the assimilation of the Global Navigation Satellite System Radio occultation (GNSS‐RO) data has a significant impact on the European Centre for Medium‐Range Weather Forecasts sub‐seasonal forecasts. The impact was measured by running two large sets of 32‐day ensemble re‐forecasts over the extended winter periods from 2020 to 2023 which were initialized from an analysis with or without GNSS‐RO assimilated. Results indicate a difference of 4 m/s in zonal wind at the equator in the two analyses and a statistically significant improvement in the reforecast skill scores up to week 4 in the stratosphere, particularly over the Tropics when assimilating GNSS‐RO. The impact in the troposphere is generally negligible. However, the amplitude of the Madden Julian Oscillation (MJO) is significantly stronger during the first 2 weeks when the reforecasts are initialized from the analysis with GNSS‐RO assimilated, suggesting a potential link between MJO prediction and the initialization of the stratosphere.

explanation: 该论文主要研究夜间降水对青藏高原地表增温的影响。通过气候模型实验，探讨了夜间降水异常如何改变土壤湿度、热通量和地表反照率，进而影响地表温度。研究发现，夜间降水及其变率是调节高海拔地区地表增温的关键因素。虽然该研究与大气环境有关，但它侧重于地表过程和气候模拟，而非直接利用遥感技术监测空气质量或分析大气成分。
topic_words: ['Land Surface Temperature', 'Tibetan Plateau', 'Nighttime Precipitation', 'CLM5.0', 'Soil Moisture', 'Turbulent Heat Flux', 'Ground Heat Flux', 'Surface Albedo']
authors: Lin Zhao;Wei Jin;S.‐Y. Simon Wang;Parichart Promchote;Zhaoguo Li;Hao Chen;Mingshan Deng;Yuteng Wang;Xianhong Meng
title: Role of Nighttime Precipitation in Mitigating Land Surface Warming on the Tibetan Plateau
abstract: The Tibetan Plateau has warmed markedly alongside increased nighttime precipitation, yet the mechanisms remain poorly understood. Using CLM5.0 sensitivity experiments with ± $\pm $50% nighttime precipitation perturbations (HALF and PLUS50) and fixed precipitation variability (FIX1979), we show that nighttime precipitation anomalies modulate soil moisture, repartition turbulent and ground heat fluxes and, during daytime, alter surface albedo. HALF and FIX1979 amplify land surface temperature (LST) warming by 0.07°C decade−1 and 0.17°C decade−1, respectively; PLUS50 reduces it by 0.06°C decade−1. LST warming sensitivity peaks over arid/semi‐arid regions and is offset responses in semi‐humid regions. The response is diurnally asymmetric: daytime LST is jointly controlled by evapotranspiration and albedo anomalies, whereas nighttime LST is dominated by changes in turbulent and ground heat fluxes. These results establish nighttime precipitation and its variability as key regulators of high terrain surface warming and demonstrate that hourly‐resolved diagnostics are essential for evaluating diurnally varying land‐atmosphere coupling.

explanation: 该论文主要研究地球核心的导热性，特别是铁镍硅合金在地球核心条件下的导热性。研究结果对地球的热演化、地核动力学以及驱动地球发电机（geodynamo）的能量来源有重要意义。论文通过实验测量了特定成分的铁镍硅合金在高温高压下的导热系数，并推断了液态外核的导热系数，进而讨论了地核-地幔边界的热流和内核的年龄。该研究与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析，没有直接关联。
authors: Wen‐Pin Hsieh;Yi‐Ting Chiang;Frédéric Deschamps;Chao‐Chih Chen;Jen‐Wei Chang;Daijo Ikuta;Eiji Ohtani
title: Moderate Thermal Conductivity of Fe‐Ni‐Si Alloy at Earth's Core Conditions: Implications for Core Thermal Evolution and Geodynamo
abstract: Earth's presently‐active magnetic field is thought to be generated by geodynamo via convection of liquid outer core, primarily composed of Fe alloyed with Ni and light elements, for example, Si. Core thermal conductivity critically controls its thermal evolution, dynamics, and available energy (thermal vs. compositional) powering the geodynamo over Earth's history. Here we precisely measured thermal conductivity of solid Fe0.85Ni0.06Si0.09 (Fe–7wt%Ni–5wt%Si) to 148 GPa/2950 K and Fe to 155 GPa/3246 K, respectively. We show that a liquid outer core with Fe0.85Ni0.06Si0.09 has a moderate thermal conductivity of ∼73 W m−1 K−1, in the moderate zone over the previously reported broad range (∼20–250 W m−1 K−1) that includes various core compositions. Such a modest isentropic, conductive heat flow at core‐mantle boundary (CMB) (∼11 TW) is smaller than present‐day CMB heat flow (∼15 TW), suggesting a presently‐active thermally‐driven geodynamo and a maximum inner core age of ∼0.8–1.3 billion‐years.

explanation: 该论文主要关注利用卫星激光雷达和多光谱数据检测水下目标，例如水下的人工石坝和防波堤。其核心方法是将复杂的多光谱信息转换为相对深度数据，从而将目标检测问题转化为深度异常检测。该研究与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等，没有直接关联。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术不相关。
authors: Hao Liu;Jian Yang;Yue Ma;Yao Li;Xiao Hua Wang
title: Detection of Submerged Targets Beyond Eyes' Observation Using Satellite Lidar and Multispectral Data
abstract: Detecting submerged targets in shallow waters from satellite platforms remains a challenge, as the optical spectral information of targets is significantly distorted by the absorption and scattering effects of the water column. In this study, we propose a new framework as the bathymetry‐informed target extraction, which integrates the spaceborne lidar data and multispectral imagery. By using lidar assisted Satellite‐Derived Bathymetry model, we convert the complex multispectral information into relative depth data. Through this transformation, the challenging issue of distorted color domain image segmentation is converted into the task of depth anomaly detection. The method is validated on submerged artificial stone weirs and breakwaters in typical open ocean and coastal waters, which indicates significant improvements in target detection rate and reliability compared to direct color‐based methods. This approach promises large‐scale surveys of submerged targets in shallow waters, offering an alternative solution to on‐site surveys such as shipborne sonars.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注加拿大区域气候模型（CRCM6）在模拟寒冷季节降水方面的表现，特别是在不同网格分辨率下对降水量、降水相态以及2米气温的模拟效果。研究通过与魁北克省地面观测站的数据进行对比，评估了模型在不同分辨率下的表现，并探讨了更高分辨率对模拟结果的改进。虽然该研究涉及大气过程和气候模拟，但它并没有直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
authors: O. Chalifour;B. Music;J. M. Thériault;D. F. Nadeau;A. Bédard‐Therrien
title: Effects of Convection‐Permitting Grid Resolution on Cold‐Season Precipitation Simulated by the Canadian Regional Climate Model Version 6 Over the Province of Quebec, Canada
abstract: This study assesses the performance of the sixth‐generation Canadian Regional Climate Model (CRCM6) in simulating the amount and phase of cold‐season precipitation as well as 2‐m air temperature. It also examines the added value of finer grid spacing, which enables the explicit representation of deep convection. Simulations were conducted at grid spacings of 0.11° (≈12 km) and 0.0225° (≈2.5 km), and the results were compared with surface observations from 35 hydrometeorological stations across Quebec over two cold seasons (October to April in 2020–21 and 2021–22). The analysis was further supported by atmospheric sounding data from two stations, and several gridded reference products. Both simulations exhibited similar large‐scale 2‐m air temperature spatial patterns with the coarser‐resolution simulation generating consistently colder values as well as a larger total precipitation amount and bias compared to station observations. The finer‐resolution simulation reduced the total precipitation bias by a factor of three. Both simulations overestimated liquid precipitation and underestimated solid precipitation with the finer resolution better capturing liquid precipitation and the coarser resolution better capturing solid precipitation. Mixed precipitation remained a challenge, being simulated at colder temperatures than observed, particularly near 0°C. The 50% rain‐snow temperature threshold (T50), which indicates when liquid and solid phases occur equally, was 0.5°C for the finer resolution and 0.8°C for the coarser resolution both below the observed 2.1°C. This study highlights the need to refine the model's representation of mixed‐phase precipitation and rain‐snow transitions.

explanation: 这篇研究论文主要关注的是利用数值模型模拟2020年2月12日北达科他州的暴风雪事件。它使用了PIEKTUK-D吹雪算法与极地天气研究和预报（PWRF）模型相结合，模拟了暴风雪期间的气象参数和吹雪现象。研究重点在于验证模型在模拟暴风雪方面的能力，特别是对能见度的影响。虽然使用了GOES-16卫星图像进行验证，但其核心内容并非大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测或大气成分分析，而是侧重于天气预报和灾害性天气的模拟。
authors: D. H. Bromwich;S. D. Shuvo;A. Kennedy;L.‐S. Bai;A. Sczepanski;J. P. Nicolas;T. Kurtz
title: Simulating the 12 February 2020 North Dakota Blizzard With the PIEKTUK‐D Blowing Snow Algorithm Coupled With the Polar Weather Research and Forecasting Model
abstract: On 12 February 2020, a ground blizzard impacted North Dakota, driven by a strong Arctic cold front that swept southward through the eastern Dakotas and western Minnesota. This event brought frontal snow, strong winds, and sub‐zero temperatures, leading to significant blowing snow (BLSN) conditions in the Red River Valley and causing widespread disruption. This research provides a detailed analysis of the meteorological phenomena on 12 February, with a focus on BLSN dynamics. We employed a BLSN algorithm based on the PIEKTUK‐D model, coupled with the Polar Weather Research and Forecasting (PWRF) model. Simulations were conducted using lateral boundary conditions from the 0.25° Global Forecast System analysis data. We evaluated basic meteorological parameters, such as temperature, wind, and relative humidity, alongside specialized parameters like snow water equivalent. Simulated BLSN features match well to the features observed in GOES‐16 images. The most significant impact of incorporating the BLSN algorithm in PWRF is observed in the vertical distribution of relative humidity. A notable outcome of this research is the successful implementation of the BLSN code to calculate visibility, which can be particularly useful during blizzard conditions.

explanation: 该研究论文利用ACE卫星上的傅里叶变换光谱仪，通过太阳掩星技术获取地球大气边缘的红外透射光谱，从而测量二氧化碳同位素（O13CO, 17OCO, 18OCO）的体积分数。研究重点是这些同位素在平流层和中层大气中的分布和季节性变化，并分析光解作用对17OCO和18OCO分馏的影响。这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它使用了卫星观测数据来分析大气成分，特别是二氧化碳同位素的分布情况。
topic_words: ['CO2 isotopologues', 'satellite observations', 'ACE satellite', 'atmospheric composition analysis', 'stratosphere', 'mesosphere', 'solar occultation', 'infrared transmittance spectra']
authors: D. English;P. Bernath;C. Boone
title: CO2 Isotopologues From the ACE Satellite
abstract: Carbon dioxide isotopologues have been studied thoroughly in the troposphere. In the stratosphere, the minor oxygen CO2 isotopologues have anomalous abundances due to their exchange reactions with isotopically fractionated ozone, differentiating them from tropospheric CO2. Previously a model predicted that this anomalous isotopic abundance continues into the mesosphere but lacked verification from experimental observations. Here we use the Atmospheric Chemistry Experiment Fourier Transform Spectrometer which records infrared transmittance spectra of the Earth's limb from low Earth orbit using solar occultation. These infrared spectra provide measurements of global CO2 isotopologue volume mixing ratios (VMRs) from the upper troposphere to the lower thermosphere. Data for the O13CO, 17OCO and 18OCO isotopologues are presented, including seasonal altitude‐latitude VMR distributions. The role of photolysis in the upper atmosphere for 17OCO and 18OCO fractionation has been analyzed and found to be “mass independent.”

explanation: 该研究主要关注热带气旋（台风）的结构特征和环境条件如何影响其强度变化，特别是当台风具有较高的“丰满度”（fullness）时。研究分析了垂直风切变、湿度、海洋热含量等环境因素，以及台风内部的边界层特征、角动量输送等结构因素。虽然研究涉及大气环境，但它侧重于台风动力学和强度预测，而不是大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，与大气环境遥感技术的直接关联性不强。
authors: Jie Ming;Meimei Su;Robert F. Rogers;Jun A. Zhang
title: Environmental and Boundary Layer Characteristics Associated With Intensity Change of Tropical Cyclones Under High Fullness
abstract: Tropical cyclone (TC) fullness, which measures the ratio of the annular width of the vortex skirt region to the total width of the outer wind field, is an important metric for characterizing TC wind structure and intensity change. High fullness is typically beneficial for intensification, but there are situations where high‐fullness TCs do not intensify. This study explores the structural characteristics and environmental conditions of weakening TCs under high fullness. Identifying these situations can be helpful for improved prediction of TC intensity change. This study analyzes 5,218 GPS dropsondes from 36 TCs to compare structural and environmental conditions of intensifying (IN) and weakening (WE) TCs under high fullness. For the environmental conditions, TCs tend to weaken with strong southerly vertical wind shear, dry air, and less ocean heat content, suggesting that more adverse conditions are required to offset the favorable effects of high fullness. In terms of structural characteristics, WE TCs have a warmer, moister boundary layer but weaker surface fluxes than IN TCs. Additionally, WE TCs exhibit stronger inward advection of absolute angular momentum within the friction layer. Above the frictional inflow layer, WE TCs display weak outflow, whereas IN TCs exhibit weak inflow. The implications of these differences in surface enthalpy fluxes and radial flow above the friction layer are discussed within the context of recent hypotheses regarding boundary layer ventilation and TC intensification.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注北极大气河流的水汽来源，通过气候模型模拟来追踪水汽的来源地，并分析不同季节水汽来源的变化。虽然涉及大气成分（水汽），但重点在于水汽的输送和来源分析，而非大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，与大气环境遥感技术的关联性不强。
authors: Weiming Ma;Hailong Wang;Shixuan Zhang;Balwinder Singh;Yun Qian;Yiling Huo;Nicole Feldl;Alexandre Audette
title: Quantifying Moisture Sources of Arctic Atmospheric Rivers During the Recent Historical Period
abstract: Atmospheric rivers (ARs), filaments of intense atmospheric moisture transport, play a significant role in delivering moisture poleward into the Arctic and triggering weather extremes. Although previous studies have focused on large‐scale circulations driving these events, this study investigates ARs through attributing their moisture sources using the Community Atmosphere Model version 5 (CAM5) with moisture‐tagging capability. Examining ARs in the Atlantic and Pacific sectors of the Arctic separately revealed distinct contributions from remote versus local, and ocean versus land, moisture sources. Unlike non‐AR events, Arctic ARs primarily draw moisture from their respective ocean basins in lower‐latitude regions during the cold season, and shift to land sources in the warm season. Cold‐season ARs in the Atlantic and Pacific sectors source 73.2% and 85.3% of their moisture from their respective ocean basins at lower latitudes, however warm‐season contributions decrease to 41.3% and 29.4%. In contrast, mid‐ and high‐latitude continents combined contribute 40.1% and 51.3% in the warm season. Trajectory clustering analysis shows that AR moisture sources depend on both their genesis regions and transport pathways. In recent decades, the Arctic has experienced a moistening trend in both the cold and warm seasons. Our results suggest that local and remote sources equally drive the observed cold‐season moistening, whereas remote sources predominantly drive the warm‐season moistening. A better understanding of Arctic AR moisture sources under current climate conditions provides valuable insights into their potential future changes amid the projected heterogeneous northern hemispheric warming.

explanation: 该论文主要研究热带海洋上空云层覆盖和降水的日变化规律，重点分析了深对流系统（DCS）的起始时间对降水和云层覆盖的影响。研究使用了卫星观测数据（GPM）和追踪算法（TOOCAN）来分析DCS的形态特征，并发现了一个意外的上午DCS起始峰值，这可能解释了海洋上空日变化幅度减小的问题。该研究与大气环境遥感技术相关，但更侧重于气象过程和云降水物理，而不是直接涉及空气质量监测、大气成分分析等领域。
topic_words: ['diurnal cycle', 'tropical oceanic precipitation', 'cloud cover', 'deep convective system (DCS)', 'satellite observations (GPM)', 'Lagrangian tracking']
authors: Sarah E. Wessinger;Anita D. Rapp;Gregory S. Elsaesser
title: An Unexpected Peak in Daytime Convection Initiation Weakens Diurnal Amplitude of Tropical Oceanic Precipitation and Cloud Cover
abstract: Earth system models (ESM) are still deficient in their representation of the diurnal cycle of tropical oceanic cloud cover and rain, underestimating cloud cover throughout the diurnal cycle and simulating an overnight rainfall peak that is slightly too early. To better understand the diurnal cycle of tropical oceanic rain and cloud cover, the diurnal cycle of deep convective system (DCS) initiation and the subsequent later‐stage accumulation of rainfall resulting from systems initiating at earlier times is analyzed using Lagrangian‐tracked DCSs. The Tracking Of Organized Convection Algorithm through 3D segmentatioN (TOOCAN) DCSs are matched to the Integrated Multi‐satellitE Retrieval for GPM rainfall product and binned by their hour of initiation (in local solar time) to evaluate morphological characteristics and contributions to rain and cloud cover diurnal cycles. Two peaks of DCS initiation are observed: an anticipated overnight peak and an unexpected late morning peak that is earlier than the expected afternoon peak in surface heating. DCSs initiated within the daytime peak have similar morphologies to DCSs initiated overnight and significantly contribute to the afternoon rain and cloud cover likely important for explaining the decreased amplitude of the over‐ocean diurnal cycle. When daytime‐initiated DCSs are excluded from the computation of the precipitation diurnal cycle, we find a closer resemblance to the NASA‐GISS ESM simulated diurnal cycle amplitude, suggesting that daytime DCS initiations may be too few or not maintained in ESMs that exhibit an over‐ocean diurnal cycle amplitude that exceeds observational estimates.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注印度居民取暖活动产生的碳质气溶胶排放，通过实地测量量化了不同燃料（如木柴、作物残渣、牛粪饼）燃烧产生的PM2.5、元素碳（EC）和有机碳（OC）的排放因子和光学性质。研究发现，取暖产生的气溶胶排放量高于烹饪活动，且具有显著的吸收特性，含有棕色碳。此外，论文还估算了印度居民取暖活动产生的PM2.5、OC和EC的排放总量，并分析了其空间分布。这些数据对于理解气溶胶的气候影响以及制定区域空气污染减缓策略具有重要意义。虽然没有直接提及遥感技术，但研究中测量的气溶胶光学性质（如单次散射反照率和吸收埃指数）是遥感反演气溶胶参数的重要输入，排放清单可以用于模型验证，因此与大气环境遥感技术具有间接的相关性。
topic_words: ['carbonaceous aerosol', 'emission factors', 'optical properties', 'PM2.5', 'elemental carbon (EC)', 'organic carbon (OC)', 'single-scattering albedo', 'absorption Angström exponent', 'brown carbon', 'air pollution', 'climate impacts']
authors: Chimurkar Navinya;Taveen Singh Kapoor;Anurag Gupta;Diksha Haswani;Ramya Sunder Raman;Jyoti Kumari;Mohd Shahzar Khan;Gazala Habib;Chandra Venkataraman;Harish C. Phuleria
title: Carbonaceous Aerosol Emissions From Residential Heating in India: Field Measurements of Emission Factors and Optical Properties
abstract: Residential activities are major contributors to global carbonaceous aerosol emissions, particularly in densely populated and low‐middle‐income countries such as India. Assessing the climatic impacts of these aerosols requires a detailed understanding of their optical properties and atmospheric abundance. Despite a strong understanding of cooking activities, residential water and space heating emissions in India remain highly uncertain. Using the field measurements, this study quantifies emission factors (EFs) and optical properties of emissions from water and space heating in India. The measured PM2.5, elemental carbon (EC), and organic carbon (OC) EFs for heating range between 2.2–20.7, 0.4–2.2, and 0.8–5.5 g kg−1, respectively, are ∼2 fold higher than those for cooking. PM2.5 EFs from firewood (20.7 ± 8.5 g kg−1) are larger than those during the crop residue (7.1 ± 5.7 g kg−1) and dung cake (17.4 ± 9.8 g kg−1) burning for water heating. These emissions exhibit significant absorption, corroborated by low values of single‐scattering albedo at 532 nm ranging from 0.17 to 0.96. A large absorption Angström exponent of 1.34–2.57 suggests the presence of brown carbon. The study estimates emissions of 1,239 (±264), 309 (±88), and 88 (±30) Gg yr−1 for PM2.5, OC, and EC, respectively, from residential heating activities in India. Spatially, emission patterns from heating differ from those for cooking, with high emissions in northern hilly regions, the Indo‐Gangetic plains, and western and southern India. The derived EFs, optical properties, and high‐resolution emissions enhance the understanding of aerosol climate impacts, offering insights for regional mitigation strategies for air pollution.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注的是巴塔哥尼亚西部地区冰川水文的建模和气候变化的影响预测，重点在于径流变化。虽然气候变化与大气环境有间接联系，但论文本身并没有直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性不强。
authors: Rodrigo Aguayo;Harry Zekollari;Sarah Hanus;Oscar M. Baez‐Villanueva;Pablo A. Mendoza;Fabien Maussion
title: Hybrid Glacio‐Hydrological Modeling Reveals Contrasting Runoff Changes in Western Patagonia Over the 21st Century
abstract: Climate change poses a serious risk for the freshwater ecosystem of Western Patagonia and threatens glacial and non‐glacial water resources. Here, we model the historical glacio‐hydrology of 2,236 catchments across the Western Patagonia, and project climate change impacts through the 21st century. To this end, we develop a novel modeling framework that combines Long Short‐Term Memory (LSTM) neural networks with ice‐dynamical glacier modeling using the Open Global Glacier Model (OGGM). We evaluate the ability of this hybrid framework to predict streamflow in ungauged basins (PUB) and regions (PUR) through 10‐fold cross‐validation and compare the results with those obtained with a LSTM model without a glacier component, and two process‐based coupled glacio‐hydrological models. The hybrid modeling approach outperforms all other approaches in 38% and 44% of the catchments considering PUB and PUR evaluations, respectively. Using our new hybrid approach, we estimate an average regional freshwater flux of 19,815 m3 s−1 for the period 2000–2019, with glacier melt contributing 29% during the summer season. Under a high‐emission scenario (Shared socioeconomic pathways 5‐8.5), the northern region (>46°S) is projected to experience the largest reductions in runoff, with dry season runoff decreasing by almost 50% by the end of the century. In contrast, runoff increases are projected for glacierized basins in the southern regions, with average relative changes of 10%–25% and a marked seasonality shift. The results highlight the potential of hybrid modeling in glacio‐hydrology and provide important information for climate change adaptation in Western Patagonia.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注南极威德尔海海冰上积雪对高度计波形的影响，特别是利用Ku波段和Ka波段雷达数据来分析积雪表面、积雪体积和冰面散射的贡献。研究重点在于开发一种基于物理模型的反向散射仿真模型（FBEM）和卷积神经网络（CNN），用于分解雷达波形，从而更准确地反演海冰厚度。虽然使用了卫星观测数据（CryoSat-2），但其核心在于海冰遥感和雷达信号处理，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、大气成分分析等）关联不大。
authors: Lu Zhou;Henriette Skourup;Julienne Stroeve;Sahra Kacimi;Stefanie Arndt;Weixin Zhu;Alek Petty;Lanqing Huang;Shiming Xu
title: Snow effects on altimeter waveforms over sea ice in the Weddell Sea — Part I: Radar waveform decomposition
abstract:
•In summer Ku-band, snow volume exceeds interface returns, biasing freeboard. •Physically based FBEM+CNN separates surface, volume, and interface scattering. •Enables snow-aware retrackers for CRISTAL and scale-consistent altimetry processing. 
 Snow on sea ice strongly modulates growth, albedo, and air–sea exchange, but it also drives major uncertainties in altimeter-based thickness retrievals. This is critical for Ku-band radar altimeters (e.g., CryoSat-2, CS-2), whose waveforms integrate backscatter from snow-covered sea ice. Contrary to the common assumption that returns originate near the snow–ice interface, complex snow properties (roughness, layering, wetness, ice lenses) can shift effective scattering upward into the snowpack. We analyze Ku-band CS-2 satellite and Ka-band KAREN airborne waveforms over the Weddell Sea to partition contributions from the snow surface, snow volume, and ice surface. Using a physics-based Forward Backscatter Emulation Model (FBEM) and a CNN trained on simulated waveforms, we retrieve geophysical parameters and assess sensitivity to snow conditions. Under typical Antarctic conditions, snow-volume scattering contributes as much as, or more than, the snow–ice interface to CS-2 returns, while Ka-band is dominated by surface/near-surface snow scattering with minimal penetration to the ice surface. Wet snow further amplifies upper-layer backscatter. Sensitivity tests identify volume scattering and ice-surface roughness as primary controls on waveform shape. These results argue for explicit snow-volume terms in waveform models and support dual-frequency strategies relevant to ESA’s upcoming CRISTAL mission. Part I (this study) treats waveform decomposition; Part II evaluates retracking for improved thickness retrievals.

explanation: 该论文主要研究地表城市热岛效应（SUHI），通过遥感陆地表面温度（LST）来评估城市热环境。论文提出了一种新的指标SUHI容量（SUHIC），用于量化城市热岛效应的总热负荷。同时，提出了一种方向增强自适应同步提取（DEASE）方法来估计SUHI强度、范围和容量。虽然使用了遥感技术，但该研究主要关注城市地表温度和热环境，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）关联不大。
topic_words: ['Land Surface Temperature', 'Urban Heat Island', 'Remote Sensing', 'Thermal Environment']
authors: Qiquan Yang;Richen Ye;TC Chakraborty;Ting Hu;Yue Liu
title: Estimation of intensity, footprint, and capacity of surface urban heat islands using a direction-enhanced adaptive synchronous extraction (DEASE) method
abstract:
•A capacity (SUHIC) indicator is introduced to measure cumulative thermal signal. •DEASE method is proposed to estimate SUHI intensity, footprint, and capacity. •DEASE method can capture directional differences in urban-rural LST gradients. •SUHIC provides a basis to assess the SUHI effect when SUHII and SUHIF diverge. 
 The surface urban heat island (SUHI) effect, assessed through remotely sensed land surface temperature (LST), remains a focal point in urban climate research. Conventional indicators like SUHI intensity (SUHII) and footprint (SUHIF) capture peak values and spatial extent but fail to account for the cumulative thermal load—a critical dimension reflecting the total heat exposure imposed by spatially continuous warming, which directly limits a holistic assessment of ecological and societal impacts of the SUHI effect. Therefore, this study introduces an indicator termed SUHI capacity (SUHIC), designed to quantify the aggregated SUHI effect by integrating the magnitude of the warming signal across all affected areas, thereby enabling a more comprehensive evaluation of urban thermal environments. Furthermore, a direction-enhanced adaptive synchronous extraction (DEASE) method is proposed for the quantification of SUHIC. This method can dynamically identify the optimal background reference area based on the urban-rural LST gradients in various directions within the city, without relying on predefined mathematical models as previously. The results from 102 European cities first confirm that the directional variations in urban-rural LST gradients, and the DEASE method can effectively capture these distinctions for the simultaneous estimation of SUHII, SUHIF, and SUHIC. Secondly, the spatial patterns of absolute SUHIC values show strong associations with those of SUHIF (R2 > 0.86), while its relative values (normalized by the area of urban) align more closely with SUHII (R2 > 0.64). More importantly, SUHIC can serve as a crucial reference for assessing the urban thermal signal when SUHII and SUHIF diverge. The proposed method and framework contribute to standardizing the quantification of the SUHI effect.

explanation: 该论文主要研究南极半岛雪藻爆发的光谱特性和遥感监测，重点在于利用遥感技术识别和分析雪藻的分布和特征。虽然遥感技术在环境监测中应用广泛，但该研究的重点是生物生态系统，而非大气环境要素（如空气质量、大气成分等）。因此，它与大气环境遥感技术的关联性不强。
authors: Barjeece Bashir;Dong Liang;Rong Cai;Faisal Mumtaz;Lingyi Kong;Yahui Zou
title: Corrigendum to “Spectral properties and remote sensing of snow algal blooms in the Antarctic Peninsula” [Remote Sensing of Environment, volume 328 (2025), 114839].

explanation: 该论文主要关注的是利用遥感技术（特别是AVHRR数据）和一种新的自回归算法来检测和分析1983年至2020年间环北极森林的燃烧面积变化。它侧重于森林火灾对地表植被的影响，而非大气环境的直接监测或分析。因此，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测大气成分等）的关联性较弱。
topic_words: ['burned area', 'circumboreal forests', 'AVHRR', 'autoregressive burned area detection algorithm', 'remote sensing']
authors: Connor W. Stephens;Anthony R. Ives;Volker C. Radeloff
title: Corrigendum to “Substantial increases in burned area in circumboreal forests from 1983 to 2020 captured by the AVHRR record and a new autoregressive burned area detection algorithm” [Remote Sensing of Environment 325(2025) 114789]

explanation: 根据标题，该论文主要关注水文应用中的遥感技术。虽然遥感技术本身与大气环境遥感技术有重叠，但水文应用通常侧重于地表水、地下水、土壤湿度等水文要素的监测和分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）的关联性较弱。它更侧重于水资源管理和水循环过程的研究。

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文研究的是砾石海滩上部潮间带的形态动力学，重点在于风暴对海滩的影响，包括侵蚀和恢复过程。研究使用了视频监测系统来量化海滩体积和海岸线的变化，并分析了风暴特征、潮汐范围和先前海滩形态等因素对风暴影响的控制作用。论文与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等，没有直接关联。
authors: E.T. Mendoza;I. Turki;E. Ojeda;A. Soloy;E. Salameh;C. Lopez-Solano;J. Deloffre;N. Lecoq
title: Storm response of the upper intertidal zone on a gravel beach
abstract:
•In a 42-year hindcast context: 2019–2020 can be considered an exceptionally energetic winter season; 2018–2019 moderate. •Video monitoring quantified upper-intertidal volume and shoreline changes. •Storm impact controlled by storm characteristics, tide range during storm impact, and previous beach morphology conditions. •Multiple regression (wave height + tide range during storm impact) explains 46 % of volume change related to storm event. •Storm clusters often erode but can also promote recovery during lower-energy phases. 
 This paper investigates morphodynamics of a macrotidal gravel beach (Etretat, Normandy, NW France) during two consecutive winter seasons characterized by moderate (2018–2019) and exceptionally energetic (2019–2020) conditions according to a 42-year analysis of hindcasted wave data. Upper intertidal beach changes and shoreline data were derived from a video monitoring system. The results show that storm impacts were strongly influenced by the storm characteristics, the tide phasing, and more importantly, by the pre-existing conditions of the beach before the impact of the storms. A multiple regression including wave height and tide range during the storm event explained 46% of the variance of the volume change due to storm events. Storm clusters often cause beach erosion but can also contribute significantly to beach recovery.

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该研究主要关注的是利用遥感技术（Landsat卫星影像）和机器学习方法来监测和分析长江中下游流域湖泊和水库中叶绿素a浓度的时空变化。虽然使用了卫星数据，但其重点在于水环境监测，而非大气环境遥感，例如空气质量监测、大气成分分析等。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术的关联性不强。
authors: Xinyi Song;Junsheng Li;Fangfang Zhang;Huanchang Ying;Xuezhu Jiang;Shenglei Wang
title: Assessing four-decade spatiotemporal changes of chlorophyll-a concentration in lakes and reservoirs of the mid-lower yangtze river basin using landsat imagery and machine learning
abstract:
•A machine learning based approach was developed to estimate Chla from Landsat data. •Chla variations in Mid-Lower Yangtze River Basin were observed over four decades. •Chla showed an rose and then fell interannual trend with a turning point in 2005–2007. •Precipitation and temperature were key factors affecting Chla spatial distribution. •Nighttime light intensity was negatively correlated to Chla interannual variation. 
 Eutrophication has become a persistent environmental challenge in the Mid-Lower Yangtze River Basin (MLYRB), influencing both water security and regional sustainability. Remote sensing provides an effective approach for retrieving chlorophyll-a concentrations (Chla). However, due to the limited spatial and temporal coverage of satellite observations and inconsistencies among satellite sensors, long-term variations in Chla across the MLYRB have not been thoroughly investigated. This study aims to fill this gap by generating a four-decade (1984–2024) Chla dataset for lakes and reservoirs larger than 1 km2 in the MLYRB using Landsat imagery. In this study, Landsat-5 TM and Landsat-8 OLI imagery were used to develop a machine learning approach based on the gradient boosting decision tree (GBDT) to estimate Chla, calibrated with 235 synchronized satellite and in situ measurements. The model showed strong performance on the testing dataset (R2 = 0.78, RMSLE = 0.21, AURE = 29.6 %) and was subsequently applied to reconstruct annual Chla maps for lakes and reservoirs across the MLYRB from 1984 to 2024. The reconstructed results revealed that Chla were highest in the Dongting Lake and Poyang Lake sub-basins (27.9 ± 2.5 and 27.8 ± 2.7 mg/m3, respectively) and lowest in the Han River and Taihu Lake sub-basins (22.7 ± 2.5 and 22.8 ± 2.1 mg/m3). Spatially, Chla distribution was strongly correlated with precipitation and temperature, which together accounted for 72.4 % of the spatial variability. A distinct transition occurred between 2005 and 2007, when mean Chla peaked at 27.6 ± 8.5 mg/m3 and the overall trend shifted from fluctuating increases to a decline. Temporally, Chla variations were largely associated with, meteorological factors, particularly nighttime light (NTL) and gross domestic product (GDP), explaining 65 % of the temporal variability. This study presents the first nearly four-decade Landsat-derived Chla dataset for lakes and reservoirs larger than 1 km2 in the MLYRB. This long-term dataset offers critical support for understanding water quality dynamics and guiding evidence-based environmental management in eastern plains of China.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注中国2015年至2024年人为排放减少对PM2.5浓度和气象条件的影响。虽然它没有直接提及遥感技术，但它对空气质量的分析与大气成分有关，并且排放和气象条件的变化可以通过卫星观测等遥感手段进行监测和验证。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术具有较强的相关性，尤其是在空气质量监测和大气成分分析方面。研究使用WRF-Chem模型和多元线性回归方法，量化了排放减少和气象条件对PM2.5浓度变化的影响，并评估了排放减少对气象变化和边界层稳定性的影响。
authors: Dongpu Li;Hongli Liu;Kaicun Wang
title: Impacts of reductions in anthropogenic emissions from 2015 to 2024 on PM<sub>2.5</sub> and meteorological conditions over China
abstract:
•Leverage a high-resolution emission inventory to investigate the impacts of emission reductions in China during 2015–2024. •Compare WRF-Chem and MLR in quantifying the contributions of emissions and meteorology to PM2.5trends. •Quantify the impacts of emission reductions on temperature profiles and boundary-layer stability. 
 Strict emission-control measures in China have markedly reduced anthropogenic emissions and improved air quality, yet their impacts remain insufficiently quantified. Using the Weather Research and Forecasting model coupled with Chemistry (WRF-Chem) together with multiple linear regression (MLR), this study quantified the respective contributions of emission reductions and meteorological conditions to particulate matter with an aerodynamic diameter less than or equal to 2.5 μm (PM2.5) in January and July during 2015–2024, and evaluated how emission reductions affect meteorological variability and boundary-layer stability. Both WRF-Chem and MLR attributed the observed PM2.5 declines primarily to emission reductions rather than meteorological conditions. Over the North China Plain, WRF-Chem attributed PM2.5 declines of −3.9/−1.8 μg m−3 yr−1 for January/July to emission reductions, whereas MLR yielded −6.3/−4.9 μg m−3 yr−1. Emission reductions increased clear-sky surface shortwave radiation by 0.36 W m−2 yr−1 in January and 0.32 W m−2 yr−1 in July, accompanied by modest increases in near-surface temperature, boundary-layer height, and sensible and latent heat fluxes, and by decreases in relative humidity. In Beijing, reduced aerosols produced surface warming in January with slight cooling at 900−950 hPa, whereas July exhibited warming below 850 hPa, increasing near-surface temperature gradients and enhancing boundary-layer instability.

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要表明，该研究使用WRF-Chem模型对巴西两个主要城市地区进行了多年的评估和应用。 这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它涉及使用模型来模拟和分析大气成分和空气质量。虽然摘要中没有明确提到卫星观测或特定传感器，但WRF-Chem模型通常用于整合遥感数据以提高其预测能力。因此，该研究与大气成分分析和空气质量监测领域相关。
authors: Daniel Schuch;Yang Zhang;Sergio Ibarra-Espinosa;Maria de Fatima Andrade;Mario Eduardo Gavidia Calderón;Michelle L. Bell
title: Multi-year evaluation and application of the WRF-chem model for two major urban areas in Brazil part II: Multi-Year evaluation and urban-centric analysis

explanation: 该论文主要关注气候变化背景下热带气旋（台风）的生成预测，利用深度学习模型，特别是卷积神经网络，来分析海面温度、垂直风切变、低层相对涡度、湿度和温度等环境因素对台风生成的影响。论文重点在于预测台风在西太平洋地区的时空分布，并探讨高排放情景下南海地区台风频率的变化。虽然该研究与大气环境有关，但其核心在于气象预测和气候建模，而非大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
topic_words: ['Tropical cyclone genesis', 'Climate change', 'Deep learning', 'Convolutional neural networks', 'Sea surface temperature', 'Vertical wind shear', 'Low-level relative vorticity', 'Humidity', 'Temperature']
authors: Feng Hu;Qiusheng Li
title: Projection of tropical cyclone genesis under climate change with convolutional mixing neural networks
abstract:
•Deep learning model with convolutional mixing captures spatial–temporal features of TC genesis. •The proposed model outperforms traditional convolutional neural networks in TC genesis prediction. •Projections show declining TC frequency over the western North Pacific through the 21st century. •High-emission scenarios suggest increased TC frequency in the South China Sea. 
 Tropical cyclone (TC) genesis projections remain a significant challenge in the context of climate change, primarily due to the intricate interactions between large-scale environmental factors. This paper presents a deep learning-based model designed to predict the spatial and temporal distribution of TC genesis in the western North Pacific under climate change. The model, built on an innovative convolutional architecture incorporating spatial and channel mixing techniques, generates heatmaps of TC genesis using key environmental variables, including sea surface temperature, vertical wind shear, low-level relative vorticity, humidity, and temperature. This model outperforms traditional convolutional neural networks in TC genesis predictions. Model projections suggest a weak long-term decline in tropical cyclone frequency across the western North Pacific over the 21st century. Vertical wind shear and low-level vorticity are key factors governing the accuracy of TC genesis predictions. In high-emission scenarios, TC frequency in the South China Sea is projected to increase. Despite uncertainties in climate model simulations, the proposed model provides valuable insights into the response of TC genesis to anthropogenic warming, offering a new framework for future climate risk assessments.

explanation: 该标题和摘要表明，该研究的重点是西哈萨克斯坦地区的大气污染问题，并采用多源分析方法。虽然涉及大气污染，但没有明确提及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。

根据提供的标题《视觉搜索过程中内部目标和外部感觉的并发选择》，以及摘要缺失的情况，无法判断该研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）是否相关。该标题暗示研究可能集中于认知科学或心理学领域，探讨视觉搜索过程中大脑如何同时处理内部目标和外部感觉信息。由于缺乏摘要，无法进一步确认研究内容，但根据现有信息，它与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较低。

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要表明，它关注南大洋冬季二氧化碳排放源被低估的问题。虽然没有直接提及遥感技术，但对南大洋二氧化碳源的研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。因为对二氧化碳的监测和分析是大气成分研究的重要组成部分，而遥感技术（如卫星观测）可以用于监测海洋表面的二氧化碳浓度，从而帮助更准确地评估南大洋的碳源强度。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术在空气质量监测、大气成分分析等方面具有相关性。

authors: Hyodae Seo;César Sauvage;Christoph Renkl;Julie K. Lundquist;Anthony Kirincich
title: Sea surface warming and ocean-to-atmosphere feedback driven by large-scale offshore wind farms under seasonally stratified conditions

explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要表明，它主要关注NAD+逆转阿尔茨海默病神经功能缺陷的机制，具体是通过调节EVA1C基因的差异选择性RNA剪接实现的。 这项研究属于生物医学领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。
authors: Ruixue Ai;Lipeng Mao;Xurui Jin;Carlos Campos-Marques;Shi-qi Zhang;Junping Pan;Maria Jose Lagartos-Donate;Shu-Qin Cao;Beatriz Barros-Santos;Rita Nóbrega-Martins;Filippos Katsaitis;Guang Yang;Chenglong Xie;Xiongbin Kang;Pingjie Wang;Manuele Novello;Yang Hu;Linda Hildegard Bergersen;Jon Storm-Mathisen;Hidehito Kuroyanagi;Beatriz Escobar-Doncel;Noemí Villaseca González;Farrukh Abbas Chaudhry;Zeyuan Wang;Qiang Zhang;Guang Lu;Ioannis Sotiropoulos;Zhangming Niu;Guobing Chen;Rajeevkumar Raveendran Nair;Joana Margarida Silva;Oscar Junhong Luo;Evandro Fei Fang
title: NAD+ reverses Alzheimer’s neurological deficits via regulating differential alternative RNA splicing of EVA1C

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注大型语言模型中由于来源框架而产生的系统性偏差。它与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该研究似乎集中在自然语言处理和人工智能领域的偏差问题，而不是环境科学或遥感领域。
authors: Federico Germani and Giovanni Spitale
title: Source framing triggers systematic bias in large language models

explanation: 该研究论文的标题“土卫二北极的内生热”表明，该研究主要关注土卫二（Enceladus）北极地区的地热活动。这与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析没有直接关系。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的相关性较低，主要研究行星科学领域。
authors: Georgina Miles;Carly J. A. Howett;Francis Nimmo;Douglas J. Hemingway
title: Endogenic heat at Enceladus’ north pole

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注能量景观工程化的离子电子学，用于构建人工热感受器，以实现增强的生物启发式热感应。 这与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。 该研究似乎更侧重于材料科学、生物电子学和传感器技术，而不是大气科学。
authors: Fan Li;Hua Xue;Xiuzhu Lin;Juan Wang;Juan Li;Hongran Zhao;Tong Zhang
title: Energy landscape–engineered iontronics enable artificial thermoreceptors for augmented bioinspired thermosensation

explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要主要关注的是工程益生菌在改善由纤维缺乏引起的结肠炎中的作用，特别是通过恢复GLP-1信号通路。它与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该研究属于生物医学领域，主要探讨肠道健康、微生物组和炎症性疾病的治疗方法。因此，它与大气环境科学无关。
authors: Leonie Brockmann;Carlotta Ronda;Logan T. Schwanz;Yiming Qu;Daniel W. Shneider;Chrystal F. Mavros;Ivaylo I. Ivanov;Govind Bhagat;Harris H. Wang
title: Engineered probiotic restores GLP-1 signaling to ameliorate fiber-deficiency exacerbated colitis

explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要主要关注DKK3-LRP1复合物以及一种化学抑制剂在阿尔茨海默病模型中调节Aβ清除的作用。这与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该研究属于生物医学领域，旨在探索阿尔茨海默病的发病机制和潜在治疗方法。
authors: Ruihan Yang;Lin Wang;Yue Li;Jian Zhu;Juxian Wang;David Schlessinger;Jian Sima
title: DKK3-LRP1 complex and a chemical inhibitor regulate Aβ clearance in models of Alzheimer’s disease

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要表明，它主要关注的是疱疹病毒的解旋酶-引物酶的结构基础，以及 Pritelivir 和 Amenamevir 对其的抑制作用。这与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该研究属于病毒学和药物研发领域。
authors: Andrey G. Baranovskiy;Qixiang He;Yoshiaki Suwa;Lucia M. Morstadt;Nigar D. Babayeva;Ci Ji Lim;Tahir H. Tahirov
title: Structural basis of herpesvirus helicase-primase inhibition by pritelivir and amenamevir

explanation: 该论文主要研究基于弹性双型晶体管的可拉伸互补集成电子器件，重点在于电子器件的材料和电路设计，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。虽然可拉伸电子器件可能在未来的环境传感器中得到应用，但本文的核心内容并非关于大气环境遥感。
authors: Yongcao Zhang;Kyoseung Sim;Hyunseok Shim;Faheem Ershad;Shubham Patel;Yingshi Guan;Cunjiang Yu
title: Stretchable complementary integrated electronics based on elastic dual-type transistors

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要表明，其研究重点是范德瓦尔斯反铁磁材料中自混合激子极化子的电激发。这属于凝聚态物理和材料科学领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的相关性较低。
authors: Jonas D. Ziegler;Sotirios Papadopoulos;Antti J. Moilanen;Marcelo Martínez;Qia Lin;Kseniia Mosina;Takashi Taniguchi;Kenji Watanabe;Zdenek Sofer;Florian Dirnberger;Lukas Novotny
title: Electrical excitation of self-hybridized exciton polaritons in a van der Waals antiferromagnet

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要表明，其主要关注点是家庭财务与监禁成本之间的关系。 这与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。 该论文探讨的是社会经济学领域的问题，而非大气科学或遥感技术。
authors: Karin Martin
title: Focusing on family finances reveals actual cost of incarceration
